mapper.sql: SELECT s.postId as "post.id", p.displayId as "post.displayId", p.title as "post.title", c.id as "post.category.id", b.id as "post.category.blog.id", b.title as "post.category.blog.title", s.targetPostId as "target.post.id", tp.displayId as "target.post.displayId", tp.title as "target.post.title", tc.id as "target.post.category.id", tb.id as "target.post.category.blog.id", tb.title as "target.post.category.blog.title", s.targetPostRevisionId as "target.postRevisionId" FROM scraps s JOIN post p on p.id = s.postId JOIN category c on c.id = p.categoryId JOIN blogs b on b.id = c.blogId JOIN post tp on tp.id = s.targetPostId JOIN category tc on tc.id = tp.categoryId JOIN blogs tb on tb.id = tc.blogId

SELECT count(*) FROM scraps s JOIN post p on p.id = s.postId JOIN category c on c.id = p.categoryId JOIN blogs b on b.id = c.blogId JOIN post tp on tp.id = s.targetPostId JOIN category tc on tc.id = tp.categoryId JOIN blogs tb on tb.id = tc.blogId
